description:
This plugin has been recently acquired by Zeroqode - please bear with us while we review the code and make improvements/fixes where necessary.

Melt down the isolation barrier that surrounds repeating groups. 
Allows you to use an external element to trigger a workflow that runs inside the repeating group cell.
You can specify one cell, a specific group of cells or all of them. 
Literally this eliminates the weird limitation of not being able to refer to things inside a repeating group.

To receive special offers and important updates please visit: https://zeroqo.de/updates

name: Orchestra (repeating group addon)
plugin_instructions: Place the Maestro element outside, Musicians elements inside the repeating group, initialize musicians like in the example and whenever you want to trigger a workflow you just specify the target cell(s) and it‚Äôll run the workflow inside the custom event provided by the plugin ‚Äúwhen the musicians are triggered this workflow will run inside each cell‚Äù.
